about_the_game:
Add more game value! TWO fans and those who are not should also get it!

This patch is amazing.
●Added a new difficulty "Walpurgis" mode.
PC and enemies are a bit more powerful than usual! And of course, there are comes out of more Gold and Star coins! It's a new mode worth playing.
●Added “Practice” mode that allows you to practice for each stage.
I can only say that I kept you waiting. Someone said that 3 of the 5 requirements to get a high score were practice ... practice, practice anyway.
●Added 2 new magic cards required for new capture.
・ When you say a “vector laser” card, is it a laser that extends vertically? Some people may think it is. But I think it's more of Kikuichi..., if anything.
・ “Traks-tan Thunder” card …… The ultimate inazuma magic that is said to have been created by that legendary witch, “Trax-tan”. The name "Trax-tan Thunder" is the strongest, yet it seems nostalgic and dangerous like I saw it somewhere ...

* "Walpurgis Mode" and "Practice Mode" can be selected in Challenge Mode.
* New cards can be obtained at the in-game shop (pumpkin balloon).
detailed_description:
Add more game value! TWO fans and those who are not should also get it!

This patch is amazing.
●Added a new difficulty "Walpurgis" mode.
PC and enemies are a bit more powerful than usual! And of course, there are comes out of more Gold and Star coins! It's a new mode worth playing.
●Added “Practice” mode that allows you to practice for each stage.
I can only say that I kept you waiting. Someone said that 3 of the 5 requirements to get a high score were practice ... practice, practice anyway.
●Added 2 new magic cards required for new capture.
・ When you say a “vector laser” card, is it a laser that extends vertically? Some people may think it is. But I think it's more of Kikuichi..., if anything.
・ “Traks-tan Thunder” card …… The ultimate inazuma magic that is said to have been created by that legendary witch, “Trax-tan”. The name "Trax-tan Thunder" is the strongest, yet it seems nostalgic and dangerous like I saw it somewhere ...

* "Walpurgis Mode" and "Practice Mode" can be selected in Challenge Mode.
* New cards can be obtained at the in-game shop (pumpkin balloon).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or Higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support to DirectX11 Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Support to DirectSound Soundcard
  • Additional Notes: For multi monitor, full screen operation is not guaranteed in Windows 7 Aero "*Scheduled for coming soon". DirectX End-User Runtime *About a controller besides I recommend a controller for X-input. About the controller except X-input, I cannot guarantee normal movement.
